comment.text: This translation key is used to display the URL of a privacy policy. It is displayed as a label in an input field on a form, prompting users to enter their organization's privacy policy URL.

ai_spell_check_issues.description: The word 'Zásad' is missing a hyphen. It should be 'Zásad-ochrany'.

While technically correct, "Tietosuojakäytäntö URL" is a very literal translation and sounds unnatural in Finnish. A more idiomatic translation would be something like "Yksityisyyskäytäntö URL" or "Tietosuojapolitiikan URL".
The term 'URL' is an abbreviation and should be spelled out at least once in formal writing to avoid ambiguity. While it's commonly understood, it's best to clarify.
ai_spell_check_issues.suggestion: ນະໂຍບາຍຄວາມເປັນສ່ວນຕົວ URL (URL - Uniform Resource Locator)

ai_spell_check_issues.description: While technically correct, a more natural Lao translation for 'Privacy policy URL' might be 'ເວັບໄຊ້ທ່ອງຖິ້ມນະໂຍບາຍຄວາມເປັນສ່ວນຕົວ' or 'ລິ້ງກ໌ນະໂຍບາຍຄວາມເປັນສ່ວນຕົວ'. The current translation is a direct transliteration and might sound awkward.
ai_spell_check_issues.suggestion: ເວັບໄຊ້ທ່ອງຖິ້ມນະໂຍບາຍຄວາມເປັນສ່ວນຕົວ

ai_spell_check_issues.description: The translation 'Konfidencialitātes politikas vietrādis URL' is not the most natural or idiomatic translation of 'Privacy policy URL'. While technically correct, it's a bit clunky.
ai_spell_check_issues.suggestion: A more natural translation would be 'Privātuma politikas URL' or 'Konfidencialitātes politikas adrese'.

ai_spell_check_issues.description: While technically correct, "URL-адреса Политики конфиденциальности" is a bit verbose and sounds unnatural. A more concise and common translation would be "URL политики конфиденциальности".
The translation uses a hyphenated word ("URL-адреса") which is not always preferred in Russian. While not technically incorrect, it can be improved for a smoother read.
The translation 'නිශ්චිතතා ප්‍රතිපත්ති URL' is not the most natural or accurate rendering of 'Privacy policy URL' in Sinhala. 'නිශ්චිතතා' is closer to 'confidentiality' rather than 'privacy'.
ai_spell_check_issues.suggestion: දේශප්‍රතිපත්තිය URL (deshapratipathiya URL) - This is a more common and direct translation of 'Privacy policy URL' in Sinhala.

ai_spell_check_issues.description: The translation uses a space before the colon. It's generally recommended to avoid this in technical contexts.
ai_spell_check_issues.suggestion: URL adresa zásad ochrany osobných údajov

ai_spell_check_issues.description: The Serbian translation "URL политике приватности" is a literal translation but sounds unnatural and isn't the idiomatic way to express "Privacy policy URL" in Serbian. It lacks a preposition connecting 'URL' and 'politike privatnosti'.
ai_spell_check_issues.suggestion: URL политике приватности / URL приватне политике (better flow)
